department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch: "本課程的目標包含讓學生了解數位遊戲式學習研究領域的發展, 以及探討數位遊戲式學習的相關設計原則."
goal.en: "The objectives of this course are to introduce the development of the field of digital game-based learning, as well as to discuss design principles of digital game-based learning."

outline.ch:
"Introduction to DGBL
Exploring existed systems / platforms / studies
Literature review in games and learning
DGBL theories
Group project"
outline.en:
"Introduction to DGBL
Exploring existed systems / platforms / studies
Literature review in games and learning
DGBL theories
Group project"

textbook.ch:
"Gee, J. P. (2004). What Video Games Have to Teach Us About Learning and Literacy. Palgrave Macmillan.
Prensky, M. (2007). Digital Game-Based Learning. Paragon House Publishers. 
Shaffer, D. W. (2006). How Computer Games Help Children Learn. New York: Palgrave Macmillan."
textbook.en:
"Gee, J. P. (2004). What Video Games Have to Teach Us About Learning and Literacy. Palgrave Macmillan.
Prensky, M. (2007). Digital Game-Based Learning. Paragon House Publishers. 
Shaffer, D. W. (2006). How Computer Games Help Children Learn. New York: Palgrave Macmillan."

gradMethod.ch:
"System exploration: 20%
Book/paper presentation: 30%
Group project: 40%
Attendance: 10%"
gradMethod.en:
"System exploration: 20%
Book/paper presentation: 30%
Group project: 40%
Attendance: 10%"

ch.competencies: 認識數位學習之發展歷史與趨勢
培養數位學習之理論素養
培養數位學習所需之科技能力
培養數位學習研究方法與推廣應用之能力
培養創新設計與協調整合之能力
培養具國際觀之跨領域人才

en.competencies: Understand the developing history and trend of network learning
Develop the theoretical accomplishment of network learning
Develop the needed technological ability of network learning
Develop the research methodology of network learning and the ability to promote and put network learning in use
Develop the ability to create a user-friendly network learning environment
Develop multi-disciplined talents with international perspective
